text: Valentin Babić (born 6 July 1981) is a Croatian football defender, who last played for NK Osijek. ==External links== *Valentin Babić profile at Nogometni Magazin Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Osijek Category:Croatian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Croatian First Football League players Category:NK Osijek players Category:Győri ETO FC players Category:Croatian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Hungary Category:Croatian expatriate sportspeople in Hungary
title: Valentin Babić
